title: Interpretation of reading Ayat al-Kursi and the exorcist in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Reading Ayat al-Kursi and the exorcist in one’s dreams has many connotations and meanings, knowing that they differ depending on the interpretations of dreams, so today we will explain the most important interpretations of this vision and the connotations it could have. A dream? The interpretation of a dream about reciting the Throne Verse and exorcising evil spirits in a dream is that the dreamer will be freed from anxiety and fear if there is something that frightens him. Reciting the Throne Verse in a dream with the eyes or with the tongue is evidence of the dreamer’s strong desire to repent to God, and that he has committed many sins. Whoever sees himself reading Ayat al-Kursi and the recitations while in reality he is suffering from financial hardship and is unable to pay his debts, the interpretation relieves him of anxiety and conditions change for the better. Whoever sees himself reading Ayat al-Kursi, the dream indicates that the dreamer will move to a better place, whether At work or moving to a better home. Whoever has problems and sees himself reading Ayat Al-Kursi and other verses from Surat Al-Baqarah, then the dream indicates the dreamer’s upcoming death, so he asks to get closer to God so that He may forgive him all his sins. Seeing Ayat Al-Kursi and exorcising evil spirits brings all that is Good for the monarch, so all dream interpreters agree to hope for goodness in this vision. Whoever sees himself reciting Ayat al-Kursi out loud, this vision gives him good news that he will be fine in the coming days. Reading Ayat al-Kursi and the recitations in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin believes that reading a verse A chair in a dream indicates that the dreamer is going through a difficult period filled with a lot of pressure and is in dire need of God’s kindness and mercy. If the dreamer faces a problem at the same time as the dream and does not find a way out of it, then the dream portends that the time has come for it to end without negative consequences, even if If he was sick, the vision portends a speedy recovery. Reading Ayat al-Kursi aloud indicates that the dreamer will achieve something he longs for, even if there are many obstacles in his way. Reading Ayat al-Kursi about the jinn in a dream is an indication that the dreamer is facing a major problem that will affect his life in a bad way. He will face many problems. Reading verses from the Qur’an in a dream indicates the psychological comfort that he will obtain in the coming days, especially if he is going through a period full of psychological pressures. Reading Ayat al-Kursi and the verses in the dream of an unmarried woman who sees herself reading an exorcist to confront the evil of the jinn, The dream indicates that the dreamer is religious. Reciting Ayat Al-Kursi and Al-Mu’awazat over an unmarried woman is a sign of the blessings that she will receive in the coming days and may foretell her marriage to a religious man. For anyone who was going through a period full of psychological pressures and worries, the dream is good news about the end of this period and the beginning of an era. New and full of happiness. An unmarried woman dreaming of reciting Al-Mawa’idat and Ayat Al-Kursi in the jinn is a warning to her that she will be exposed to an emotional problem and she must be patient to overcome this crisis. Reading Ayat Al-Kursi and Al-Mawa’idat in a dream about a married woman.

title: Interpretation of seeing a talisman in a dream according to Ibn Sirin’s interpretation

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a talisman in a dream According to Ibn Sirin’s interpretation, some believe that it is important to search for interpretations of dreams, especially those dreams that remain engraved in the memory even after waking up from sleep and the body and mind are still greatly affected by it, or dreams that are repeated more than once and more. Of the night, although there are no sources that confirm that dreams actually occur or that they are an interpretation of the reality of real situations and people, so in this article we will learn together about the interpretation of seeing a talisman in a dream according to the interpretation of Ibn Sirin.Interpretation of a dream of seeing a talisman in a dream Interpretation of Ibn Sirin’s vision Ruqyah in a dream is an auspicious dream, as it is a sign of getting rid of Satan’s obsessions. It also foretells a quick recovery from diseases that afflict the dreamer. The dreamer may have this dream as a result of psychological disturbances and a feeling of fear of a certain thing. The talisman for the pioneer can take two forms. First: It may be the recitation of the Prophetic hadiths and Qur’anic verses, and in this case it indicates a feeling of tranquility and reassurance, or it may come without the Qur’an, and in this case it indicates. That the dreamer was struck by magic. Ibn Sirin says in interpreting the legal ruqyah in a dream that it is a sign of the dreamer’s long life, good reputation with God, and closeness to Him. Also, let us see that it suggests getting rid of diseases, obstacles, and problems that threaten the psychological well-being of the individual. Reading ruqyah in a dream is a sign From God, the dreamer should come to him and remember him often. Interpretation of the dream of seeing luxury in a dream for a single woman. If an unmarried girl dreams that she is reading the legal ruqyah, then her dream indicates that the problems she faces will soon go away and her sorrows will go away. In the event that an unmarried woman hears about the legal ruqyah in... In her dream, this is an indication that she is going through some negative feelings that are affecting herself, but she will be able to get rid of them as quickly as possible. It is a promising vision for an unmarried woman to see herself asking someone else to recite Rukia for her, and this is good news that she will get rid of her enemies and get On money. On the other hand, if an unmarried woman sees herself reading the ruqyah for someone close, then this vision is news of an upcoming marriage. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a talisman in a dream for a married woman. Seeing the legitimate ruqyah in a dream for a married woman means that she will settle down and get rid of problems inside and outside her family. A promising dream for a married woman is that she dreams of reading a ruqyah, because it is news of an imminent pregnancy. A woman’s dream indicates that her children are reading a legitimate ruqyah in a dream, which portends the death of their worries and concerns and the attainment of happiness. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a talisman in a dream for a pregnant womanIf a pregnant woman sees in her dream that He recites the ruqyah to her child, this indicates her good intentions in giving birth to her child. If a pregnant woman sees in her dream that her husband recites the legitimate ruqyah to someone she does not know, this is evidence that her husband will find a new job, and it may be in a place far from her, but there. There is no doubt that it will contain a lot of good things. If a pregnant woman sees herself reading Al-Ruqyah to her child, then...

title: Interpretation of seeing a wig in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a wig in a dream: See the point: hair that is familiar with cheating and hypocrisy. It also indicates the presence of many problems in the dreamer’s life. Interpretation of seeing a wig is that the dreamer shows the opposite of what is inside him, and is evidence of the extent of the dreamer’s failure in his life and the victory of his enemies over him. If the dreamer sees in a dream, he is wearing A red wig: This indicates the speed of this person in many aspects of his life and decision-making. It also explains the passage of many difficulties, problems and challenges to achieve the goals that the viewer wants and aspires to. On the other hand, seeing hair tied indicates the presence of a traitor near the dreamer who is chasing him and conspiring against him. However, if the fortuneteller sees a lot of wigs, this indicates the presence of a lot of tension and anxiety in the dreamer’s life and his feeling of constant sadness. As for what we will see, a red wig is interpreted by the seer who commits sins. If a pregnant woman sees that the wig she is wearing has fallen off, this indicates the passage of her pregnancy. She can give birth safely and easily. Also, seeing a wig in a dream indicates that this woman is giving birth to a female. Seeing a man and diseases wearing a wig explains this man’s betrayal of this woman. Seeing a man wearing a wig indicates that he is a deceitful person who loves harm and deception. Also, seeing a wig with long hair indicates To reach many of the dreams and aspirations that the dreamer seeks. It also indicates the major scandal that the fortuneteller will be exposed to. This vision also shows haste in making decisions and not thinking about judging matters. Also, seeing a man wearing a black wig can indicate the best of his affairs and improvement. His life is in order at best and he is better off if he is bald. It also explains this man’s loss of his money, the loss of that money, and the great loss that he will incur in a business of his own. It also explains the affliction of this divine temptation and many problems. Interpretation of a dream of wearing a wig for a single woman: seeing a wig In the dream of an unmarried girl, it is an unpleasant vision, because it indicates the presence of immortal people near her. As for what we will see of the wig on the girl’s head, this is interpreted to rid her of worries and problems, and the end of the state of depression that predicted the previous period. Also, seeing the girl activating her hair Her wig indicates her attachment to a person who does not suit her and that it may cause her dissatisfaction with his behavior towards her. If a girl sees an unattached wig falling from the head of someone she really knows, this shows that this girl will soon reveal the matter of this person. The girl is wearing a wig and shows her happiness as she wears it. Approaching Her wedding date. Interpretation of a dream about a wig. Interpretation of seeing a divorced woman wearing a wig, as this indicates her strong desire to stay away from people’s eyes and disappear. It also indicates her strong desire not to reveal her secrets and not tell people about her personal life. See also the same wig. Long hair, and indicates that there are many Of the deceivers in her life who are running her schemes. Dreaming of a black wig for a married woman. This vision indicates that a married woman will attain a high and prestigious position in her life.

title: Interpretation of seeing an evil woman in a dream

preview.html: We have to explain this to the pioneer and make the complete picture for those who see an evil woman in a dream. Read the rest of the article from gptafser.com/. Interpretation of seeing an evil woman in a dream for a single girl. Seeing an evil old woman in a dream for a single girl. It may indicate that he will obtain a position that he sought, but In an inappropriate way, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. Whereas, if a girl sees an evil, ugly woman in a dream, this indicates some of the problems she faces in life, and God knows best. However, if an unmarried woman sees in a dream that an evil woman fulfills her rights, this indicates that there are some major problems. Which faces insight, and God knows best. Seeing an evil woman chasing an unmarried girl can be interpreted. There are those who are jealous of her or hate her and she must realize that. If an unmarried girl sees an evil woman and shakes hands with her in a dream. The person with the vision must review the issues in her life. Because the interpretation shows that He does something that harms others. When an unmarried girl sees that there is an evil old woman, and she has beaten the unmarried woman in a dream. It is a sign of harm beingfall him, and he should be careful. See also: Interpretation and meaning of seeing an unknown and strange woman in a dream. Interpretation of seeing an evil woman in a dream for a woman. MarriedIf a married woman sees that there is an evil woman chasing her in a dream. The foresight will suffer from some family problems. It may indicate the presence of an evil person causing problems in her life. If a married woman sees that an evil woman entered her house in a dream. This dream could indicate problems And financial crises, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. While if he sees that he is hitting an evil woman in a married woman’s dream. It is a sign of liberation from problems and difficulties, but in the wrong way. A dream about an evil old woman appearing in an ugly way can be interpreted in a married woman’s dream. She should be concerned with worldly matters. In the life of the dreamer and avoid that. We conclude from this that seeing an evil woman in a married woman’s dream indicates the presence of some disputes or problems in the life of the dreamer, and God knows best. An attempt to kill an evil woman in a married woman’s dream. It suggests getting rid of those they hate, and perhaps It suggests getting rid of envy. Interpretation of seeing an evil woman in a dream for a man and its meaning Seeing an evil woman in a dream may indicate a married man. However, he will suffer some financial losses that will soon go away, according to the totality and ugliness of this evil. Whereas if a married man says that there is an old woman An evil woman in his house in a dream. The vision may indicate the illness of a person in that house, and God knows best. But if a married man sees that there is a very ugly, evil woman in a dream. The vision indicates the hatred of poverty that will afflict this house, and God is the Most High, the Most High. It is said that you see An evil woman in a married man’s dream. It is a state of sadness that prevails in this house, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. It could symbolize seeing an ugly evil woman in a married man’s dream. The visionary has suffered some failure or failure to achieve what that person wants, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. An evil woman follows a married man in a dream. It indicates an atmosphere

title: Seeing a lover after parting in a dream for a single woman

preview.html: It also indicates that she is going through a period full of sadness and mental and physical exhaustion from this separation, and after that the love of her life, and God knows best, so stay with us to find out more from the website gptafser.com/.Interpretation of seeing a lover after separation in a dream for a single girl: to see that an unmarried woman sees her beloved After she separates in a dream, and cries in front of her intensely. This is an indication that she is still thinking about him and dealing with matters, the topics of his life and his studies if he is studying. And if she knows him from her place of work, then she should stay away from him and think firmly about her life. The unmarried girl who has seen her lover after Separation: She was marrying another woman in the dream. This is an indication of her extreme jealousy of this person, and that she believes that he is still there for her only. She must alert him and his bad condition, which will make her very sad in her life, and God knows best. The single woman who sees her lover after the separation asks him Returning to her life again. This is a sign that you are serious about bringing this person back to life. And that he is already thinking about her and that he wants to return to her and enter into her life again. See also: Interpretation of dreams about a lover’s chest after separation. Interpretation of following a lover after separation in a dream for a married woman. To see that a woman The married woman sees her lover smiling after her separation and is happy with him. Here I am referring to the many doors of goodness that will open for her, God willing, at this time. It will put an end to the sorrows that she is experiencing in this period of her life, God willing. And the married woman who sees in a dream that her beloved after separation was... He marries another woman. This indicates that she is still pinning her hopes and dreams on people who are not good at life. And that she gives great trust to the untrustworthy people in her life and around her. Seeing a married woman living in separation from her husband, and her lover returning to her, indicates that you will get rid of Of the problems that you have with him at this time in their lives, God willing. And that you live with them very happily and well, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. Interpretation of seeing a lover after separation in a dream for a divorced woman. Seeing a divorced woman sees her lover after separation and she was very sad about this separation. It shows her great desire to return to This lover again and is chasing her intensely. It also indicates that he is trying hard to end some of the heartache between them, and God knows best. And the divorced woman who looks at her lover in a dream after separation and gets married in the dream. Here she says that he is still changing for her and feels the desire to have him back in her life. And she is trying to make an effort to return to him, even if that means making her sad and embarrassed. A divorced woman who sees in a dream that her lover after breaking up was talking to her a lot. This is a sign that she will enter a new emotional life with a new person and will be very happy. As evidenced by the presence of... New experiences, this divorced woman will change her life. Read also: Interpretation of dreams of entering the lover’s house for a single woman. It also indicates that he is trying hard to end some of the heartache between them, and God knows best. And the divorced woman who looks at her lover in a dream after separation and gets married in the dream. Here she says that he is still changing for her and feels the desire to have him back in her life. And she is trying to make an effort to return to him, even if that means making her sad and embarrassed. A divorced woman who sees in a dream that her lover after breaking up was talking to her a lot. This is a sign that she will enter a new emotional life with a new person and will be very happy. As evidenced by the presence of... New experiences, this divorced woman will change her life. Read also: Interpretation of dreams of entering the lover’s house for a single woman. Interpretation of seeing a lover after parting in a dream for a man and its meaning. Seeing the dreamer was watching the woman he loved after they separated in a dream and longing for her. It indicates

title: Interpretation of almonds in a dream by Ibn Sirin: Seeing almonds in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about almonds for a single, married or pregnant woman or Indian red greenInterpretation of a dream about almonds from MillerAlmonds are a good omen. He's hiding a fortune. However, it will be accompanied by sadness for a while. If there is any imbalance in the tonsils, your disappointment in fulfilling the desire will be complete until new situations arise. Almonds: denotes death by diseases or isolation. Category: Indicates the pursuit of Satan. Seeing almonds for a woman. Seeing almonds for a married woman indicates that she will live a happy life with the family and that God will help her raise her children properly and may indicate pregnancy soon, while green almonds show her purity and chastity. As for eating almonds for a married woman, it indicates stability in Married life and peeling almonds indicates changes in married life and may indicate that she will find money or a new job. Seeing almonds for a pregnant woman is evidence that she is pregnant with a boy of good character and evidence of kindness, blessings, good health, happiness, and good offspring. As for her eating almonds, it is evidence of joy in the future and that she Good wife. We will. As for peeling almonds for a pregnant woman, it is evidence of happy events as well as positive changes that will happen to her and happiness in her life, and green almonds are evidence of a happy life. Almonds in an unmarried girl’s dream are evidence that she has a very good reputation, so if she sees that she is eating almonds, this It indicates that a man of good reputation will propose to her, and if she sees that she is peeling almonds, this indicates the changes that will occur in her life, and seeing almonds is evidence of good news in the near future. Interpretation of seeing almonds for a man: When a married man sees almonds in his dream, this is evidence of the abundance of goodness in the coming days. It also indicates happiness and stability in married life. Eating almonds for a married man is a sign of good offspring and joy, or that he will reach a great position and obtain a great profit. And abundant living. He is a wise man who takes responsibility. Seeing almonds in a man’s dream is evidence of his safety from illness, his strength with money, good health, and following a broad diet. Almonds in a man’s dream are evidence of an abundance of money, and if their color is green, it indicates inner peace, and peeling almonds indicates an attempt. The visionary can change his negative aspects and change circumstances for the better if he wants. Machine. For a young man, seeing almonds is evidence of happy news or buying new things, eating almonds is evidence of maturity and good experience in life, seeing green almonds is evidence of goodness in the future and successful choices, and peeling almonds on them is evidence of freedom from worries and sorrows, God willing.

title: Learn about the interpretation of a dream about Ibn Sirin’s imprisonment

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about Ibn Sirin’s prison. Many people are searching for it so that the dreamer knows what its connotations are, and many details have been provided about Ibn Sirin, Al-Nabulsi, Ibn Shaheen, and other famous dream sciences. Interpretation of a dream about prison by Ibn Sirin. According to what Ibn Sirin said, seeing a prison in a dream indicates evil. Evil is in addition to exposing the viewer to psychological harm. Seeing the prison in his dream with panic and despair is a sign that his inner fears control his actions and it is better for him to start controlling and controlling his emotions so that he can start a new life in a different way. Interpretation of the dream about Nabulsi prison. Seeing Nabulsi in a dream about prison is a sign Relief from anguish and the end of worry, in addition to the Lord (the Most High) answering prayers, and when the dreamer sees him leaving prison in a dream. It indicates recovery from an illness that afflicted him. When a person notices that the prison door is open in front of him and he exits it in a dream, this symbolizes his freedom from distress that may cause him serious harm. Interpretation of a dream about Ibn Shaheen’s prison. Ibn Shaheen says that seeing a prison in a dream indicates the harm that will befall him. Ibn Sirin says that seeing a prison in a dream An unmarried woman means that she has committed some wrong deeds that she needs to atone for and repent. Accompany her. The girl’s vision of the prison doors opening in front of her to get out of it easily suggests that she is in control of her life and her ability to achieve all her desires and goals that she has sought many times. Interpretation of dreams of my brother going to prison for an unmarried woman. An unmarried woman who sees her brother going to prison in a dream shows his morals Bad and that he made a mistake during that period and she must encourage him to do good so that he develops and becomes a different being. Interpretation of a dream about prison by Ibn Sirin for a married woman: Seeing prison in a married woman’s dream symbolizes - as Ibn Sirin explained - the accumulation of psychological pressure on her, and that she cannot take A time for rest or relaxation. The indication for the dreamer that she sees prison in a dream is that she lacks herself and does not seek rest until she regains interest in what she is responsible for. Interpretation of a dream about Ibn Sirin’s prison for a pregnant woman. If a woman dreams of a prison in a dream, this proves her effort in taking care of her children and her desire to provide them with everything Means of attention, but she is constantly busy and this makes her irresponsible. A dream about a woman being locked up while she is pregnant could be a sign that she is thinking a lot about caring for the child and relating to him throughout her life, especially if it is in the first months and if the woman is in the last months. Months of pregnancy and seeing a prison in a dream, it shows her panic about the birth process and that it will be difficult for her, as Ibn Sirin said. Interpretation of a dream about Ibn Sirin’s imprisonment for a divorced woman. Ibn Sirin states that seeing a divorced woman imprisoned in a dream is a sign of many good things that her wife will gain.

title: Interpretation of a dream about Alwaleed bin Talal by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about Alwaleed bin Talal in a dream: The dream contains many indicators and signs that depend on the psychological and social state of the person in real life, in addition to the nature of the dream and the events that the person sees during his sleep. Interpretation of a dream about Alwaleed bin Talal Seeing Alwaleed bin Talal in a dream is evidence of great success The fame that a person achieves in real life, in addition to achieving an excellent position, makes him gain the respect and appreciation of everyone around him in reality. Seeing Prince Walid bin Talal in a dream is a sign of the sophistication and progress that a person achieves throughout his life, regardless of the many blessings and benefits that he obtains and helps. To build a happy and stable life without problems and troubles. If you see Al-Waleed bin Talal angry in a dream, this is evidence of the illegal paths that the dreamer is taking and resulting in many material benefits, and he must repent and stop the wrong actions that distance him from God Almighty. Interpretation of a dream about Alwaleed bin Talal by Ibn Sirin: Seeing Alwaleed bin Talal sad in a dream is evidence of a person’s many problems in his professional life and his exposure to dismissal from work, in addition to his entering a difficult period in which he suffers from many accumulated debts and not paying them on time. I dream of seeing Prince Bin Talal giving the dreamer the king’s crown in a dream, and it is an indication of the great places that the dreamer will reach in his life and the achievement of many goals and ambitions that he sought with all his energy and effort. Seeing the prince angry at the dreamer in a dream is evidence that you are entering a period in which problems and conflicts abound and the dreamer is suffering from a great financial loss that he cannot bear, as he ends up in prison. Interpretation of a dream about Al-Waleed bin Talal for an unmarried woman. Seeing Prince Walid bin Talal in a dream for an unmarried girl Being married is a sign of kindness and blessing in her coming life, in addition to achieving desires and aspirations after many efforts and not surrendering to the difficult reality and losing confidence in success. In the event that she sees Alwaleed bin Talal giving the dreamer a valuable gift, indicating that she will start working in a new job that will bring her many gains. Finance to help her provide a happy and stable life. In the case of her daughter, who is a student, the dream indicates success in study and obtaining high grades. A girl’s dream of a prince asking for her hand in a dream indicates marriage in reality to a young man with good qualities who will have the best husband and relationship in the world. His next life and supports her to achieve her dream and goal. Interpretation of a dream about Al-Waleed bin Talal for a married woman. Interpretation of a dream about Al-Waleed bin Talal in a dream for a married woman is a guide to ending the problems and disagreements that disturbed her stable life and the beginning of enjoying a new life full of joy, happiness and mutual understanding with her partner. In the event that the father is present with Prince Bin Talal , which indicates the dreamer’s shortcomings towards her parents and her lack of attention to them and visiting them, she must reconsider herself and think correctly before it is too late, as the parents will be honored

title: Interpretation of walking with friends in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing walking with friends in a dream. See a single man. Walking with a friend in a dream indicates his admiration for her and the preoccupation of his mind and heart with this friend. If an unmarried woman sees in her dream that she is walking with her friends, including those with whom she is emotionally attached, this is a sign that her relationship and marriage are approaching soon, God willing. Walking in a dream with friends indicates that it is above the strong bond that binds them. It also indicates the degree of understanding and loyalty between them and their staying together forever. Interpretation of walking in a dream for a married woman Married / Married When she sees in her dream that she is walking with her husband and the road is not paved, this indicates the presence of disagreements between them. And her husband. If you see her walking with her children and the road is smooth and straight, this bodes well for the married woman that her children will succeed and excel in their studies, and it also shows her interest in them and the extent of her care for them. Also, the dream of a married woman who has delayed childbearing foretells that God will get her pregnant in the near future, God willing. Interpretation The dream of walking down the street for a married woman: Walking down the street for married women: It reflects marital life, stability and understanding that characterizes her family life at the present time, which has a positive impact on the path of her life. Ibn Sirin says in the interpretation of the vision Married / Married In her dream that she is walking alone in the street, this indicates a great degree of femininity And the beauty that a woman enjoys and the effect of the excitement and frequent staring at her on those around her. And when you saw her walking on a road, and the road is long and full of green and flowers, these are praiseworthy visions that foretell to the monarch that he will receive a lot of happy and good news. As for seeing him walking in the street and it was raining This dream indicates that he is one of the people who enjoys managing his affairs well and making good decisions at the right time. As for seeing him walking down the street, the weather was sunny and mild, which indicates how much she loves her husband and that her married life is blessed with a great deal of affection and understanding. Interpretation of the dream of walking with a group Of the people, Ibn Sirin says in the interpretation of the dream: Walking with a group of people. This shows what the dreamer shares with those around them in their search for livelihood, and their diligence and effort in bringing benefits that help them get through their lives. This indicates close friendship and participation in the field of work, and the friendship and understanding that this brings together. Crowd, also suggests camaraderie in travel. If he sees that walking with a group of people that no one knows. This indicates the constant fear and anxiety that the viewer experiences for his life and the life of his family, so he must continue the journey because his fear is not real and does not pose any danger to his real journey. Interpretation of a dream about walking with someone I know for single women. Ibn Sirin and other scholars such as Ibn Shaheen narrated that walking single in a dream with someone you know indicates that you will achieve what you want for a single woman. The first of these wishes is a dream of engagement and marriage, and in this dream there is good news that she will get married soon from her heart, God willing. We call this vision unrelated. This is due to Khi
